name: Secret of Mage Yob
description:
Secret of Mage Yob (aka gaMe boY) is a game made with GBStudiov1.1, for the minijam 30, with theme "maGe yoB" :p , and limitation "Must have more than one playable character"

== Controls  =========================
Game Boy Buttons : 
arrows
=>Move
Start (Enter on keyboard)
=>Access menu
A (Z or W according to keyboard nationality)
=>Action

== Story ================
Yob was a Mage who studied monsters.
Everyone liked him, and people gave his name to their city.
Bur one day, he disappeared.

== CREDITS ================================
Program by Niamov, with GB Studio 1.1
Sprites from seiken densentsu
Chapter 1 Music from unknown artist here : https://modarchive.org/index.php?request=view_by_moduleid&query=185459
Chapter 2 Music from myself (I am not a good composer :/ )
